front.title: A Differentiated Service Two Rate Three Color Marker for Efficient handling of in-Profile Traffic

abstract.t: This document describes a two rate three color marker that has been in use for data services including Frame Relay services. This marker can be used for metering per-flow traffic in the emerging IP and L2 VPN services. The marker defined here is different from previously defined markers in the handling of the in-profile traffic. Furthermore this marker doesn’t impose peak rate shaping requirements on customer edge (CE) devices.
